title: F/S Raw T206's - Group #2 Piedmont / Sweet Caporal
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: F/S Raw T206's - Group #2 Piedmont / Sweet Caporal
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards for sale.  Prices include shipping and insurance.  Payment throught PayPal (gift only please) or money orders or check.  Please reserve by email.

Billy Campbell - Doesn't appear to be trimmed but is 1/32" short - $25
George Gibson - Tiny lower left wrinkle in border - $37
Nap Rucker (Throwing) - Great looking but slight trim at top - $20
Ed Willetts - Lower left corner wrinkle on reverse / chip top border - $35
